title: $1,750 Studio Units Available
posting_body: ['Studio Apartment:', 'Monday - Friday 8am to 4pm', 'Similar units also available.', 'Amazing location.', 'Centrally located.', 'Union Square, Financial District.', 'Steps away from convenient stores, bars, restaurants, coffee shops, public transit, china town, union square and more.', 'Elevator access, well maintained, On site manager.', 'This cosmopolitan building is perfect for the working professional or student.', 'Studio', 'Great Downtown location.', ' Studio unit, New Drapes, Walk in closet, Bath, hardwood flooring.', 'Bike room for fee.', 'Water, garbage, heat and gas paid.', 'You pay for PG&E (electricity), internet and telephone.', 'Security Deposit (equal to 1 X rent for 1+ yrs employment with same employer, 2 X if employed less than 1 yr with same employer).', 'One year lease term.', 'Sorry, but no pets.', '$1,750/$1,750 Deposit', 'Close to:', '*', 'Within walking distance to Financial District, Union Square, Chinatown Entrance, Bart, Muni.', '* One block away from Academy of the Art', 'Contact:', 'Terri (Resident Manager)', 'Bush Street Apartments', 'Address: 625 Bush Street (between Powell & Stockton)', 'San Francisco, CA 94108', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Monday to Friday: 8am to 4pm']
